sentences.text: How has it been going in terms of the trial?
Yeah, it's been fine from what I gather, we just are adjusting to the new chat system.
It's a little different to what we were using.
So, I've been traveling as, you know, this week.

So I haven't had a good opportunity to keep an eye on things closely, but I have just set up the woocommerce integration right before our call, and I've done an initial test right now and I'm actually not seeing the… order information.
I'll share my screen with you to.
Begin with, yeah, I'll just help you.
Can you see my screen here?
So, in this case, as you can see under the apps, the customer email is not found.
Is it there in the woocommerce under this email address?
I don't know how to, ah… the top bar.
I need to shrink it to go to the next tab.
You can, yeah, you have to, also, can you share your entire screen?
Because if you're comfortable sharing the woocommerce page as well, so that I can see?
That's exactly what I'm going to do.
So, can you see now my?
Now, I can see, yes, yes.
So if you see here this email address?
It's from an existing order that we have.
Now, if we go back to?
It doesn't show you the order details.
Can you click on the email address info there?
Where you see all the email addresses like to, from the details, ah, yes.
So it's coming from this email address to support.
And when did you, when did you do the setup of woocommerce?
Right now, so I've done the setup.
That is, that might be the reason.
Was, yeah, that would be, yeah, yeah, yeah, because it really takes some time.
But because when it's looking now, it just says, no customer found, I'll keep an eye on it for new orders if you think that's what it is for new emails, can?
You try refreshing this page once and see if it's working, sure because it will work.
There should not be a problem as long as there is a history or details in the platform.
It could be because it's just syncing and taking some time.
Can you go to the details apps?
So, it is searching for the correct email?
Can you check for any other lead?
Any other email with any other email address?
Let me get someone from the.
This is a contact form, so that's not.
It has to be coming from a customer email address, sure.
And then it should show you.
Ah, this one seems to be working actually.
This is also coming from this customer.
Maybe it could be a one off case.
It might take some time to reload and show you the complete data there, but I'm sure it will come up as long as you have that in your application.
so, if I click this, let me just, does that actually open the order record?
It would be better if we could see products here, but that's okay.
At least it opens the order record that's useful.
Yeah, you can open the record.
Well, it is working in this case, so I'll keep an eye on it.
The only thing I haven't set up is the phone yet because I'm traveling this week.
I won't have a chance till next week, but the trial is ending.
I have got my team using the system.
So I'd like to proceed and purchase the license now or today, but on a monthly basis, please, without a contract?
Can you click on the hiver icon and click on upgrade, we can look at different plans that we had.
So for the monthly, can you click on the monthly button?
are looking at the growth plan, right?
What's the difference here between the pro?
I mean, there are differences for the functionality.
Pro has a chatbot it has, which you don't want, right?
It has csat and all of those things.
But I think based on the conversation that I've been having growth will suffice, your need.
It has woocommerce, it has live chat.
It has certain automations that you can set and other stuff as well.
So, I think you can start with growth plan for three users.
So, since we sell in bucket of five, so it'll be for five users?
So you don't sell per user?
So it starts at minimum two.
I see, can I get to, does that include administrator?
Because I don't actually do any customer service.
So we have to get five.
So that'll cost you 175 dollars per user, so.
As long as it provides sufficient value for my business.
To be honest, I haven't had enough time to, like I said, just test your chat system, et cetera.
If it works fine with the existing workflows with my chat as… compared to the old system.
Because the organizational email system's fine.
That's we don't have a problem with that.
It's really just the chat and I haven't had a chance to test the telephone yet, as mentioned, but I mean, this is on a monthly basis, right?
So we can cancel if it doesn't work for any reason.
It's not contract you can, and I hope that you don't have to cancel.
It should work smoothly for you.
But yeah, for now, you could go ahead with monthly because of course, going annual is more, you… know, you'll get a 20 percent off straight.
So you can then next month decide if you want to, you know, implement that.
Yeah, it's going to be several months.
I want to test workflows first.
And then I can decide on annual, all right.
So if I click buy now.
Yeah, you just have to put in the details and it'll be upgraded.
It's going to be taking credit card details, yes.
So I'll do that at the close of our call then, and yeah, see how that goes.
And if I need additional assistance from yourself or, from hiver, do I reach out to you or how do we do this?
You can reach out to me.
You can also connect with the hiver support team as they are available 24 seven.
So, like I've mentioned, you click on the hiver icon.
From there, you can just start the chat right away if you want.
I can offer you an onboarding call wherein you can invite your team members.
If you are out, they can just join in this week and I can give them sort of a overview of how they can use hiver so that they don't find any difficulty.
Do you want me to schedule that?
When do you want me to do this?
Because then, I'm back home and I can join effectively and we can collaborate.
So I'm on the same page.
Let's do that next week when, or should we do it on Tuesday around the same time?
No, I'm getting off a 20 hour flight.
Let's let's say later in the week would be ideal.
Because Friday, I'll be off next week.
Thursday and I'm on Cyprus time zone.
I can't remember what time we collaborated or met up last time when I was in Cyprus, but around that same time.
So, after lunchtime Cyprus time or somewhere there is usually ideal.
think it's GMT plus two at this time morning time.
So on Friday we connected the same time works for you.
Four PM istc is time in Cyprus, is it plus GMT plus two?
I'll just double check my calendar.
And you can invite the other team members as well?
It says Singapore for some reason.
So I've got, so… I'm in a different time zone.
So all my appointments are a bit on this time zone.
So it's a bit confusing, but I think the afternoon is free.
think there'll be 12 30 for you on Thursday next week.
Let me share the invite then.
And in the meantime, you can complete the payment so that your account is transferred.
And then I'll take any questions and help you with the onboarding next week.
Anything else that I could help you with and let me know about that lead that you were not getting the details on.
If you still don't get it, just let me know so that I can get it checked.
I'll have the team work, you know, on through their workflow, day to day, monitor it and let me know if it continues.
Yukta, we'll speak next week then, bye.
